author: Lisa H
text:
Purchased a pair of shoes for an Xmas present for my son and was charged and given a delivery time of before Xmas.  One week later and still says "waiting for seller to ship".  After trying for hours to get a live answer, was told it was an "oversight" and "for some reason" the seller was given longer but now they can't guarantee I'll get by Xmas and that I'll even get product at all.  And they will not pay extra to expedite to a customer when they have made an error.  Offered me a refund since they did charge me one week ago but that obviously doesn't do me any good as now I don't have time to get the product for Xmas.  Waiting to see how this turns out and hopeful I can modify this review with a happy ending.

UPDATE: Thank you for responding.  The sneakers I purchased were released in April.  My order was confirmed on Wednesday, December 8th and the seller was given until the end of the day today to ship.  That is four business days.  Not sure why that differs from your stated reply.
title: Xmas disappointment

author: Lisa H.
text: You are lucky if you get your order.  I placed my order and due to “problems with their system” didn’t realize the seller didn’t ship until six days later (seller had two days) when I contacted them.  Rather than provide me with a replacement - as stated on their website “no extra cost” to customer - they said “sometimes the system doesn’t work”and couldn’t find a replacement and decided to cancel my order and issue a refund (which I will receive in 2-7 days).  Yet, I can go back online and order my own replacement from their site for $30 more than original price.  When I inquired about this, customer service told me I didn’t understand their costing models.  This was their mistake.  They overlooked the seller shipping deadline.  I could of ordered a replacement item four days ago and would of received over holidays.  Why they wouldn’t of solved my problem immediately today by allowing me to buy replacement pair with a promo code to honour original price I don’t know.  Instead no solutions were offered, no attempts were made to offer any additional support.  I was also told their customer service doesn’t support a phone conversation.  Terrible.  First and last experience with StockX.
title: You are lucky if you get your order
